name: My WatchList
body: ### Welcome to the official My WatchList GitHub page. This project is maintained by Zenj1n. ### About My WatchList My WatchList is a Android application that allows you to maintain a list of your favorite TV shows and movies and help you keep track of them. It is an easy to use application that follows the Google Android Guidelines. Some of it's top features are: * Maintaining a list of your favorite TV shows. * Maintaining a list of your favorite movies. * Keeping track of your favorite TV shows. * Discover new and popular TV shows. * See what your friends and family are watching. * May or may not help you win wars. ### Installation Unfortunately, My WatchList is currently in a Pre-alpha state. It is therefor not yet available to the public. When the application will be available, we will update this page accordingly. Please check back later. ### Authors and Contributors My WatchList is an application made by Zenjin, a dutch company founded in March 2014. Core teammembers include: Fabian Fremouw (@Falio), Hoye Lam (@hoyelam), Jason Lie (@Jtlie) and Rinesh Ramadhin (@RineshRamadhin). More information can be found on our Google+ page. ### Support or Contact Having trouble with My WatchList? Check out the documentation [here](https://github.com/Zenj1n/Watch-List/wiki) or contact us at [TODO] and weâ€™ll help you sort it out. ### License My WatchList 1.0 Copyright (c) 2014 Zenjin *** END USER LICENSE AGREEMENT *** IMPORTANT: PLEASE READ THIS LICENSE CAREFULLY BEFORE USING THIS SOFTWARE. 1.
